mapper.select: select * from (select def.*,dep.DEPLOY_TIME_ from ACT_RE_PROCDEF def ,ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT dep where def.DEPLOYMENT_ID_=dep.ID_) as a where 1=1 and a.ID_ like concat('%', #{id}, '%') and a.KEY_ = #{key} and a.NAME_ like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT r.*,x.*, CASE WHEN x.assign_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN x.assign_id IS NULL THEN 0 END AS isassign FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM task_assign t where t.data_type ="01" and t.user_task = #{usertask} AND t.processkey = #{processkey} ) x ON r. role_id = x.assign_id where r.del_flag=0 and r.status=0 and 1=1 and r.role_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT r.*,r.user_id as role_id,r.user_name as role_name, x.*, CASE WHEN x.assign_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN x.assign_id IS NULL THEN 0 END AS isassign FROM sys_user r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM task_assign t where t.data_type = "02" and t.user_task = #{usertask} AND t.processkey = #{processkey} ) x ON r. user_id = x.assign_id where r.del_flag=0 and r.status=0 and 1=1 and r.user_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from task_assign where assign_id = #{assignId} and data_type=#{datatype}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sysu.user_id as role_id, sysu.user_name as role_name FROM TASK_ASSIGN t JOIN sys_role r ON t.ASSIGN_ID = r.role_id JOIN sys_user_role pr ON r.role_id = pr.role_id JOIN sys_user sysu ON sysu.user_id = pr.user_id WHERE t.DATA_TYPE = '01' and t.user_task = #{usertask} and t.processkey = #{processkey}

SELECT DISTINCT sysu.user_id as role_id, sysu.user_name as role_name FROM TASK_ASSIGN t left JOIN sys_user sysu ON sysu.user_id = t.assign_id where t.DATA_TYPE = '02' and t.user_task = #{usertask} and t.processkey = #{processkey}
